Just start your evolution with many inputs disconnected. Let's say 
your st=
aring genome has only one connection, in the next generations 
some mutatio=
ns add more, and only these networks that have useful 
inputs connected are=
 selected.. This can be slow, however, if the 
mutation rate is too low.. 
=
You should check out the NEAT FAQ... 
The rtNEAT release can start this way=
. 

Peter
